attributes.action: Reduce the cost of vaccinations and other preventative procedures in vet surgeries
attributes.additional_details:
Vet prices have become un-affordable for most in the last few years and this petition is aimed at getting a unified price scale for preventative measures including vaccinations and boosters for all animals and also more importantly reducing the cost of neutering to prevent unwanted litters of puppies.

By reducing these costs everyone can then afford to prevent illness and breeding at far more affordable costs.

Vaccinations currently stand at £60-70 for a puppy and boosters are £40 per dog each year, Neutering starts at around £100 depending on dog weight/breed.

These costs need reducing now and by signing you agree it is time for a reduction in preventative procedures for animals.
